nodes.text:
MB450 macrobinoculars were a type of macrobinoculars that allowed users to see objects at a distance clearly. They included an aid which relayed the distance and altitude of objects, and could also be used when it was dark. Some versions of the macrobinoculars possessed a recording function which allowed for the saving of pictures.
Luke Skywalker owned a set of MB450s that he used to observe a group of Tusken Raiders following his hunt for R2-D2.
